entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -12.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 06:50 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -12.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -17.7°C
Wind: WNW 51 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this afternoon. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Friday 03 March 2023
